name: Rampart Tactics AR
description:
Works with iPhone X, XS, XS Max, and XR.

Rampart Tactics AR DOES NOT support iPhone SE, 5s, 6, 6 Plus, 6s, 6s Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus.

Get ready for an exciting augmented reality turn based strategy experience. Create squads from the eight different character classes and battle against AI opponents in the single player campaign, or challenge a friend in local PvP multiplayer over WiFi.
Additionally, you can team up with a friend and face off against powerful bosses in the PvE mode.
Customize your warriors with powerful weapon upgrades as you level them up, and equip them with “runes” that boost their stats and add other buffs. Watch the epic battles play out on your living room floor, your work desk, or wherever you choose in this Augmented Reality experience.
